sentence.Network_en: Cage was an iconoclast. He refused to be bound by western musical traditions of harmony and structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 凯奇是个反传统的人。他拒绝接受西方有关和声和结构的音乐传统的束缚。

sentence.Network_en: But he shows little sign of being an iconoclast.
sentence.Network_cn: 但他表现出他是一个信念很强的人.

sentence.Network_en: I hope I'm an iconoclast. My role is the one who doesn't give a hoot.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望我能成为叛逆者,毕竟自己只是个小角色.

第五型人格 + 第四型人格侧翼 = 偶像破坏者(Iconoclast)  5w4: 倾向第四型,  为人比较有创意,想到什么便说出来,为人着想,有同情心,也比较感性,甚至因为.

list.abs: our purpose is to make the realtime distance learning use the advantage of network fully , and the teacher and student can finish their mission more conveniently and efficiently in this iconoclastic model .目的是使实时远程教学更加充分地利用网络的优势，使学生和教师在这种突破传统的教学模式中更为高效、方便
两次圣像破坏运动(iconoclastic movement)。该运动颇表现拜占庭人宗教政治艺术概念。
因此才有“破坏圣像运动”（Iconoclastic Movement）。关于这一点，宗教改革所产生的新教，是同中世纪的天主教有所区别的。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... iconoclast 偶像破坏者 iconoclastic 打破旧习的 iconodule 崇拜偶像者.
The film is an iconoclastic allegory ., 电影是一个关于破坏的寓言.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in sense 2): via medieval Latin from ecclesiastical Greek eikonoklastēs, from eikōn 'likeness' + klan 'to break'

entry.tran: 打破传统信仰(或习惯)者
entry.def: If you describe someone as an iconoclast, you mean that they often criticize beliefs and things that are generally accepted by society.

example.ex: Cage was an iconoclast. He refused to be bound by western musical traditions of harmony and structure.
example.tran: 凯奇是个反传统的人。他拒绝接受西方有关和声和结构的音乐传统的束缚。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who tries to destroy traditional ideas or institutions

auth_sentence.content: The old iconoclast has never accepted boundaries.

auth_sentence.content: Table tennis had lost its greatest iconoclast as well as its most colourful star.
